background.content: As a Product Manager with a passion for technology and social impact, I bridge the gap between innovative solutions and human needs. My journey in product management has been driven by a commitment to creating meaningful digital experiences that make a difference.
background.title: Background

expertise.content: My core strengths include product strategy development, user research, agile methodologies, data analytics, and cross-functional team leadership. I excel at translating complex technical concepts into business value and building products that truly resonate with users.
expertise.title: Expertise

approach.content: I believe in a user-centered, data-driven approach to product development. By combining deep user empathy with rigorous analytics, I create products that not only meet business objectives but also deliver exceptional user experiences.
approach.title: Approach

about.intro: Hi, I'm Jonathan. I'm passionate about technology and making a positive impact.
about.mission: My mission is to help others leverage technology for positive change.
about.title: About Me

vision.content: I believe in leveraging technology to create products that not only solve problems but also contribute positively to society. My goal is to lead product initiatives that combine innovation with social responsibility.
vision.title: Vision
